title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 70.3 - Placard required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 70.3 - Placard required

State Regulations

Every motor vehicle registered in New York that is powered
by a hydrocarbon gas fuel shall bear a placard which meets the standards set
forth in section
70.4
of this Part. This shall
apply regardless of whether the hydrocarbon gas is the primary fuel or is a
secondary fuel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
70.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
